statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_tokens;
SELECT token_name, total_supply FROM blockchain_tokens WHERE issuer = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_tokens WHERE total_supply > 1000;
SELECT token_name, creation_date FROM blockchain_tokens WHERE issuer = 'Bob' ORDER BY token_name DESC;
SELECT token_name, SUM(total_supply) AS total FROM blockchain_tokens GROUP BY token_name HAVING total > 50000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_tokens WHERE total_supply > 100000 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT token_name, issuer FROM blockchain_tokens WHERE token_name LIKE 'BTC%' ORDER BY token_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_tokens WHERE issuer = 'Ethereum Foundation' OR issuer = 'Binance' AND total_supply < 50000;
SELECT token_name, total_supply FROM blockchain_tokens WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_supply DESC;
SELECT issuer, COUNT(*) AS token_count FROM blockchain_tokens GROUP BY issuer HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY token_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_asset_tokens ORDER BY token_id DESC;
SELECT token_name, token_value FROM digital_asset_tokens WHERE token_value > 1000;
SELECT token_id, token_owner, token_value FROM digital_asset_tokens WHERE token_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT token_id, token_value, token_owner FROM digital_asset_tokens WHERE token_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT token_name, token_owner, token_value FROM digital_asset_tokens WHERE token_value < 500 ORDER BY token_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_asset_tokens WHERE token_value > 1000 ORDER BY token_id DESC
SELECT token_name, token_owner FROM digital_asset_tokens WHERE token_owner = 'Alice'
SELECT token_id, token_value FROM digital_asset_tokens WHERE token_name LIKE '%token%'
SELECT token_name, token_owner, token_value FROM digital_asset_tokens WHERE token_owner = 'Bob' AND token_value < 5000
SELECT token_name, token_owner, token_value FROM digital_asset_tokens WHERE token_value BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY token_value
SELECT * FROM digital_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_symbol, asset_value FROM digital_assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM asset_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, transaction_date FROM asset_transactions WHERE sender_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_symbol, asset_value FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_value > 100 ORDER BY asset_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_name, asset_symbol, asset_value FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_value > 1000 ORDER BY asset_value DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, da.asset_name, ao.owner_name, t.amount FROM asset_transactions t JOIN digital_assets da ON t.asset_id = da.asset_id JOIN asset_owners ao ON t.sender_id = ao.owner_id WHERE t.amount < 500 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT ao.owner_name, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM asset_transactions t JOIN asset_owners ao ON t.sender_id = ao.owner_id GROUP BY ao.owner_name HAVING num_transactions > 3;
SELECT da.asset_name, MAX(t.amount) AS max_amount FROM asset_transactions t JOIN digital_assets da ON t.asset_id = da.asset_id GROUP BY da.asset_name ORDER BY max_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tokens ORDER BY token_name DESC;
SELECT token_symbol, total_supply FROM tokens WHERE total_supply > 1000000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-11-01' ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE previous_block_hash IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM tokens WHERE total_supply > 1000000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT token_name, token_symbol, total_supply FROM tokens WHERE total_supply < 500000 ORDER BY total_supply ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '0xabc' AND receiver_address = '0xdef';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE nonce = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM asset_tokens;
SELECT id, token_name, total_supply FROM asset_tokens WHERE total_supply > 1000;
SELECT token_symbol, token_name FROM asset_tokens ORDER BY token_symbol DESC;
SELECT * FROM token_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT owner_id, token_id, owner_address FROM token_owners ORDER BY owner_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM asset_tokens;
SELECT id, token_name, token_symbol FROM asset_tokens WHERE total_supply > 1000000;
SELECT token_id, from_address, to_address, amount, timestamp FROM token_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT token_id, owner_address, ownership_percentage FROM token_owners WHERE ownership_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY ownership_percentage DESC;
SELECT token_id, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM token_metadata WHERE token_id = 12345;
